alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Doniphan; Johnson; Leavenworth; Wyandotte (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 12:51AM CDT until June 08 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WYANDOTTE...SOUTH CENTRAL DONIPHAN...LEAVENWORTH... NORTH CENTRAL JOHNSON...EASTERN ATCHISON...SOUTHERN BUCHANAN AND PLATTE COUNTIES... At 1251 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Atchison to near Easton to Tonganoxie, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Shawnee, Lenexa, Leavenworth, Lansing, Atchison, Bonner Springs, De Soto, Tonganoxie, Platte City, Basehor, Edwardsville, Weston, Kansas City, Agency, Dearborn, Camden Point, Linwood, Rushville, Easton and Tracy. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 410 and 413. Interstate 29 between mile markers 13 and 42. Interstate 435 between mile markers 10 and 34. Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 210 and 226. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
